verbose_text: For integrin alphaIIb blocking experiments, F (ab) 2 fragments were generated from a rat IgG2b control antibody (LTF-2, BioXCell) and an integrin alphaIIb blocking antibody (Leo.H4, EMFRET) using the Pierce F (ab) 2 generation kit according to the manufacturer 's instructions (Thermo Fisher).
evidence: integrin alphaIIb blocking experiments, F(ab)2 fragments
